import{INCREAMENT,DECREAMENT}from'../action_types';export var increamentAction=function increamentAction(data){return{type:INCREAMENT,data:data};};export var decreamentAction=function decreamentAction(data){return{type:DECREAMENT,data:data};};//异步action,action的值为一个函数
export var increamentAscynAction=function increamentAscynAction(data,time){return function(dispatch){setTimeout(function(){dispatch(increamentAction(data));},time);};};
